inputs: Landing page for a new energy drink brand. The design needs to be dynamic and energetic with a modern feel. Use vibrant shades of blue and orange in a dark mode color palette. The main selling point is the drink's unique boost formula, targeting athletes and active individuals. The tone should be motivational and upbeat, with bold fonts like 'Impact' or 'Futura', and sharp, angular borders to convey energy and movement.
mainStyle: body { font-family: 'Futura', Arial, sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background-color: #121212; margin: 0; padding: 0; } h1, h2, h3 { font-family: 'Impact', 'Arial Black', sans-serif; color: #ffa500; } a { color: #1e90ff; text-decoration: none; } a:hover { color: #ffa500; } .container { margin: 0 auto; padding: 1rem; max-width: 1200px; } .button { background-color: #1e90ff; border: none; border-radius: 4px; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-align: center; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; } .button:hover { background-color: #ffa500; } .sharp-border { border: 2px solid #ffa500; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px; }

components.content: GIFP(a vibrant, sleek logo featuring a stylized energy drink can with dynamic motion lines around it, in blue and orange colors.)
